ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] hey ppl read this  if intrested in equestrielle
ygData.msgSnippet: for one am glad that you have fun doing it.....but to be honest everything that you have written I have gotten half way thru or less and given up reading it.
ygData.messageBody:
for one am glad that you have fun doing it.....but to be honest everything that you have written I have gotten half way thru or less and given up reading it. Not because I don't understand but because it is too FRUSTRATING to read it witn some many "incorrections". So hopefully when have something important to say you take the time to do it correctly so you can get your point across. Remember man (and woman) is a creature of habit you might accidently see it carry over when you don't need it most. Just some advice and I know that a $.35 will get you ...yadda yadda yaddda.   Jerry

lori smith <lizardbretteq@...> wrote:
oh ok.......then no i almost never make fun of ppl if i dont know them unless they make me really mad  then i do! ne wayz yes i do this for fun but not to make fun...2 very different things! well c yall later! bye bye

Su <suceress@...> wrote:
What was your grade in reading comprehension? I was saying that you could
spell correctly but that you were purposely misspelling things for fun.
I had assumed you were doing it to make fun of people who type like that.
:-)
If I were a mean person I'd ask if your whole life was 10 years. ;-D
luv,
-Su
